text: Thurnen is a municipality in the Bern-Mittelland administrative district in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2020, the former municipalities of Kirchenthurnen, Lohnstorf and MÃ¼hlethurnen merged to form the new municipality of Thurnen.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 31 December 2019 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2020 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Bern-Mittelland
title: Thurnen, Bern
